AI Description: The py-et-xmlfile is a Python library that provides efficient XML file reading and writing capabilities using ElementTree with a focus on performance and memory management.
Core Features: The library offers fast and memory-efficient handling of large XML files, supports reading and writing XML files using ElementTree, provides easy-to-use APIs for XML parsing and manipulation, and emphasizes performance optimization for processing XML data.
General Tags: Python Library, Xml Processing, Elementtree, Performance Optimization
